title: DOJ Targets Affirmative Action in College Admissions (Audio)
itunes:title: DOJ Targets Affirmative Action in College Admissions (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- KC Johnson, a professor at Brooklyn College, discusses reports that the Trump administration is planning to investigate anti-white bias in U.S. college admissions. He speaks with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
